alert.note: Alert for Freeborn; Steele; Waseca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 12:58AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Freeborn, Steele and southeastern Waseca Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 1258 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Waterville to near Waseca to near Waldorf. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... New Richland around 110 AM CDT. Medford around 120 AM CDT. Owatonna, Ellendale and Geneva around 130 AM CDT. Hollandale around 140 AM CDT. Blooming Prairie around 145 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Clinton Falls, Waseca Airport, Lemond, Merton, Steele Center, Otisco, Rice Lake State Park, Bixby, Deerfield and Owatonna Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 20 and 49. U.S. Highway 14 between mile markers 156 and 182. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
